text: "Driving Home for Christmas" is a 1988 Christmas song by English singer Chris Rea. It was taken from his compilation album New Light Through Old Windows. It had modest chart placings until 2007 when it placed at #33 and reached its new peak of #10 in 2022. It has been covered by many artists since then. ==Track listings== == References == Category:1988 songs Category:Christmas songs Category:Chris Rea songs Category:Saint Etienne (band) songs Category:Engelbert Humperdinck songs
title: Driving Home for Christmas
